targets.query: SELECT mean("send_avg")  / 1000000 FROM "current" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("send")  * 1000000000 / mean("duration") FROM "current" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT ("Tpss") FROM "statistic" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: 分区使用率、磁盘读取、磁盘写入、下载带宽、上传带宽，如果有多个网卡或者多个分区，是采集的使用率最高的网卡或者分区的数值。
panels.title: 服务器资源总览表(每页10行)
